SENT.plain: We report a case of an extremely early recurrence of left atrial myxoma in a 13-year-old girl
On hospital admission, the clinical presentation was of cerebral embolism with noticeable spotty skin pigmentation and hypertelorism
The left atrial myxoma originated from the roof of the left atrium
The histology specimen showed typical finding of a myxoma
Six months later a new intracardial mass was evacuated, the postoperative result showing the same type of myxomatous tissue
The genetic analysis of the child's family was negative, demonstrating de novo mutation of this rare disorder
